title: Spread your wings: making it with TAFE
creator_credit: John O'Shea, Chris Stewart, Documentary Films and Technical and Further Education
brief_description: An impressionistic film which is intended to provide information about the opportunities offered by Technical and Further Education in vocational training, and in recreational courses to meet community requirements. It is not intended to give detailed information on the breadth of courses and curricula but is rather a stimulus film aimed at encouraging enrolment.
